WorkItem.Description:
I'm using a combobox column in a datagridview. 
Through the Datasource , DisplayMember and ValueMember, I bind the combobox to a datasource using Entity Framework.
 
To my surprise , when I click the combobox , the response is very slow.
 
I then use a datable to store the data  used by combobox instead of Entity Framework to decrease the database access times.
The performance is somewhat better , but the response of the combobox column in the datagridview is still slow , especially compared with a combobox control on a form.
 
Would you please provide us with a more efficiant solution when using combox column in a datagridview?
Thanks a lot.
WorkItem.Summary: Slow response when using combobox in winform datagridview
